name: Code Smell Doctor
description: Detect and refactor code smells using Martin Fowler's catalog
longDescription: Detects all 23 classic code smells from Martin Fowler's catalog across 5 categories: Bloaters (Long Method, Large Class, Primitive Obsession, Long Parameter List, Data Clumps), OO Abusers (4 smells), Change Preventers (3 smells), Dispensables (6 smells), and Couplers (5 smells). Each category has a dedicated reference doc with concrete detection heuristics (e.g., method >15 lines, class >300 lines, >4 parameters) and the specific refactoring technique to fix each smell. Reports findings with severity rating, exact file:line location, evidence from the code, and recommended fix. Language-agnostic -- works on any codebase.
